description: '''Nabihah Iqbal''' (born 22 April 1988) is a British musician, writer and broadcaster from [[London]], England. A former legal professional, she has studied at both [[SOAS University of London|SOAS]] and [[University of Cambridge|The University of Cambridge]]. She first released music under the alias '''Throwing Shade''' in 2013 whilst contributing vocals to [[Sophie (musician)|Sophie]]'s early releases such as [[Lemonade (Sophie song)|Lemonade]]. She switched to her birth name for her debut album ''Weighing of the Heart''.
